      • importOperator

        public SymbolMap.Named importOperator(java.lang.String libraryName,
                                      java.lang.String description,
                                      java.lang.String operatorName,
                                      java.lang.String operatorSymbol,
                                      int usingPrecedence)
                               throws java.lang.Exception
        import operator implementation from library
        Parameters:
        libraryName - the name of the library expected to contain operator
        description - the description of the operator to be added to symbol table
        operatorName - the name of the operator to be found in the library
        operatorSymbol - the symbol to be associated with the new operator
        usingPrecedence - the precedence to associate with the operator
        Returns:
        the named symbol generated for configuration item
        Throws:
        java.lang.Exception - for failure to find operator

                               throws java.lang.Exception
        import function implementation from library
        Parameters:
        libraryName - the name of the library expected to contain function
        description - the description of the function to be added to symbol table
        functionName - the name of the function to be found in the library
        functionSymbol - the symbol to be associated with the function
        Returns:
        the named symbol allocated for the new function
        Throws:
        java.lang.Exception - for failure to find function

      • importSymbol

        public void importSymbol(java.lang.String[] elements)
                  throws java.lang.Exception
        import symbols using command line lexical elements "CONSTANT", "add a named constant to the symbol table" "LIBRARY", "the class path to a library accumulation object" "EXTEND", "name", "the class path to a library extension object" "GRAPHICS", "the class path to an expression charting library" "RENDERING", "the class path to an expression rendering library" "VALUE", "library name", "value description", "value name", "symbol" "FUNCTION", "library name", "function description", "function name", "symbol" { , "notation", "configuration" } "OPERATOR", "library name", "operator description", "operator name", "symbol", "precedence" { , "notation", "configuration" } "POLYNOMIAL", "family name", "optional full classpath, default is net.myorb.math" "SPECIAL", "family name", "optional full classpath, default is net.myorb.math"
        Parameters:
        elements - the text that defines an symbol object being imported
        Throws:
        java.lang.Exception - for failure to instance a named object
